verses.verse: <S%H2005>Behold<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> whom I <S%H8551>uphold;<s%> my <S%H972>elect,<s%> in whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7521>delights;<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> on him: he shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> to the <S%H1471>Gentiles.<s%>
He shall not <S%H6817>cry,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up, <S%H3808>nor<s%> cause his <S%H6963>voice<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H2351>street.<s%>

A <S%H7533>bruised<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> shall he not <S%H7665>break,<s%> and the <S%H3544>smoking<s%> <S%H6594>flax<s%> shall he not <S%H3518>quench:<s%> he shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> to <S%H571>truth.<s%>

He shall not <S%H3543>fail<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> be <S%H7533>discouraged,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he have <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> in the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H3176>wait<s%> for his <S%H8451>law.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he that <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H5186>stretched<s%> them out; he that <S%H7554>spread<s%> forth the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and that which <S%H6631>comes<s%> out of it; he that <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H5397>breath<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> on it, and <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to them that <S%H1980>walk<s%> therein:

I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H7121>called<s%> you in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and will <S%H2388>hold<s%> your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and will <S%H5341>keep<s%> you, and <S%H5414>give<s%> you for a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> for a <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles;<s%>

To <S%H6491>open<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> out the <S%H616>prisoners<s%> from the <S%H4525>prison,<s%> and them that <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> out of the <S%H3608>prison<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
I am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> that is my <S%H8034>name:<s%> and my <S%H3519>glory<s%> will I not <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H312>another,<s%> neither my <S%H8416>praise<s%> to <S%H6456>graven<s%> images.

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> things are <S%H935>come<s%> to pass, and <S%H2319>new<s%> things do I <S%H5046>declare:<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> they <S%H6779>spring<s%> forth I <S%H8085>tell<s%> you of them.

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> and his <S%H8416>praise<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> you that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> that is <S%H4393>therein;<s%> the <S%H339>isles,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof.

Let the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof <S%H5375>lift<s%> up their voice, the <S%H2691>villages<s%> that <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> does <S%H3427>inhabit:<s%> let the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H7442>sing,<s%> let them <S%H6681>shout<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
Let them <S%H7760>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H339>islands.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> as a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he shall <S%H5782>stir<s%> up <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> like a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war:<s%> he shall <S%H7321>cry,<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> <S%H6873>roar;<s%> he shall <S%H1396>prevail<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

I have <S%H5769>long<s%> time <S%H2814>held<s%> my <S%H2814>peace;<s%> I have been <S%H2790>still,<s%> and <S%H662>refrained<s%> myself: now will I <S%H6463>cry<s%> like a <S%H3205>travailing<s%> woman; I will <S%H5395>destroy<s%> and <S%H7602>devour<s%> <S%H3162>at<s%> <S%H3162>once.<s%>

I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H2717>waste<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and <S%H3001>dry<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6212>herbs;<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5103>rivers<s%> <S%H339>islands,<s%> and I will <S%H3001>dry<s%> up the <S%H98>pools.<s%>

And I will <S%H3212>bring<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> by a <S%H1870>way<s%> that they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not; I will <S%H1869>lead<s%> them in <S%H5410>paths<s%> that they have not <S%H3045>known:<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H4285>darkness<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H4625>crooked<s%> things <S%H4334>straight.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to them, and not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> them.

They shall be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> they shall be greatly <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> that <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H6459>graven<s%> images, that <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H4541>molten<s%> images, You are our <S%H430>gods.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> you <S%H2795>deaf;<s%> and <S%H5027>look,<s%> you <S%H5787>blind,<s%> that you may <S%H7200>see.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H5787>blind,<s%> but my <S%H5650>servant?<s%> or <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> as my <S%H4397>messenger<s%> that I <S%H7971>sent?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H5787>blind<s%> as he that is <S%H7999>perfect,<s%> and <S%H5787>blind<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5650>servant?<s%>
<S%H7200>Seeing<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> things, but you <S%H8104>observe<s%> not; <S%H6491>opening<s%> the <S%H241>ears,<s%> but he <S%H8085>hears<s%> not.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2654>well<s%> <S%H2654>pleased<s%> for his <S%H6664>righteousness'<s%> <S%H4616>sake;<s%> he will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and make it <S%H142>honorable.<s%>

But <S%H1931>this<s%> is a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H962>robbed<s%> and <S%H8154>spoiled;<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H6351>snared<s%> in <S%H2356>holes,<s%> and they are <S%H2244>hid<s%> in <S%H3608>prison<s%> <S%H1004>houses:<s%> they are for a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5337>delivers;<s%> for a <S%H4933>spoil,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>Restore.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> among you will give <S%H238>ear<s%> to <S%H2063>this?<s%> who will <S%H7181>listen<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> for the <S%H268>time<s%> to come?

<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H4882>spoil,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to the <S%H962>robbers?<s%> did not the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he against <S%H2098>whom<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned?<s%> for they <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> were they <S%H8085>obedient<s%> to his <S%H8451>law.<s%>

Therefore he has <S%H8210>poured<s%> on him the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and the <S%H5807>strength<s%> of <S%H4421>battle:<s%> and it has <S%H7760>set<s%> him on <S%H3857>fire<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, yet he <S%H3045>knew<s%> not; and it <S%H1197>burned<s%> him, yet he <S%H7760>laid<s%> it not to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
